Posts.EditableText: There is something wrong with the Textadventures.co.uk website. Commenting doesn't work, and I haven't seen anyone upload a new game or make a new review in the last few weeks. What's up with this?
Posts.HTML: There is something wrong with the Textadventures.co.uk website. Commenting doesn't work, and I haven't seen anyone upload a new game or make a new review in the last few weeks. What's up with this?

Posts.EditableText: Odd - something caused commenting/reviewing to break. I've fixed it now, thanks for pointing this out.
